Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, Serializable
public class GameController extends Object implements Observer, Serializable
This class represent the controller of the game. Show messages, check win conditions, add players to the game.
See Also:

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String nickname, VirtualView virtualView)
      Method that handle the login of a player. Check if it's the first or if is a reconnecting player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the player.
      virtualView - virtualView associated.
